title: Chicken stir fry
ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon medium dry sherry', '1/2 tablespoon Chinese five spice', '1 teaspoon ground szechuan pepper', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '350g chicken, chopped', '3 teaspoons groundnut oil', '4 spring onions, sliced', '2 leeks, sliced', '1 red pepper, sliced']
